link.title: Saginaw Covenant Academy - News

form.name: aspnetForm

li.span: It's Not too Late to Graduate!

div.p: The Covenant Academies Foundation (CAF) serves to prevent youth homelessness and youth incarceration by providing educational opportunities and other services, including residential, to dropout, homeless, at-risk and disenfranchised youth. We focus on retention, progress and graduation. Through access to education, support services and community partnerships, the Covenant Academies Foundation offers unconditional love and absolute respect to our most vulnerable youth.

div.span: 2020 Covenant Academies Foundation. All Rights Reserved.
